item.title: Japan’s Takaichi eyes decisive mandate as polls point to snap election landslide
item.description: The poll showed that the LDP-led coalition was likely to secure more than 300 of the 465 seats in the Lower House.

item.title: U.S. asks American citizens to 'leave Iran now' ahead of high-stakes talks with Tehran
item.description: Differences over the scope for the talks have also cast doubts on whether it will still go ahead, keeping open the risk of U.S. military action.

item.title: U.S.-China power struggle thrusts Panama Canal back into the spotlight
item.description: It follows a contentious decision from Panama's top court to rule against a Hong Kong-backed firm’s right to operate two key terminals on the waterway...

item.title: Sen. Slotkin refuses DOJ interview request over troops video: 'The intimidation is the point'
item.description: Slotkin's lawyer urged U.S. Attorney Jeanine Pirro to retain her records in case the senator files a lawsuit over the probe.

item.title: Hillary Clinton wants testimony on Jeffrey Epstein in public: 'Let's stop the games'
item.description: "You love to talk about transparency. There's nothing more transparent than a public hearing," Hillary Clinton told House Oversight Committee leaders.
